channel.title: Dadmother - 物の哀れ (mono no aware) [post rock/post metal/goth rock]
channel.description:
This has been far from a productive year for me musically, but I feel like this has given me time to focus on other important things in my life, as well as to hone in some more on my craft and continue improving on the quality of my music. With that said, for the first time since March, I’m proud to present a new track. I had a lot of fun making this, and it really helped to rekindle some creative embers in the ol’ noggin. Thank you for listening, and I hope you enjoy!
This is [物の哀れ (mono no aware)](https://soundcloud.com/dadmother/mono-no-aware?ref=clipboard) ![image|500x500](upload://dohD1k8flBMGmDzHlvGvV31XvUl.jpeg)
